title: Information Please Almanac
aka: Information Please Almanac, Atlas and Yearbook
additional-notes: The title 'Information Please Almanac, Atlas and Yearbook' began to be used in 1961, and continued in use for some years afterwards.
The Almanac was published in multiple editions, often for different newspapers.  Some of the editions have their own renewals.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Nat Bender for copyright research on this title.
